errors.errorMessage: Bucket names must be between 3 (min) and 63 (max) characters long.
Bucket names can consist only of lowercase letters, numbers, dots (.), and hyphens (-).
Bucket names must begin with a lowercase letter or number.
Bucket names must end with a letter or number.
Bucket names must not contain two adjacent periods.
Bucket names must not be formatted as an IP address (for example, 192.168.5.4).
Bucket names must not start with the prefix xnâ€”.
Bucket names must not end with the suffix -s3alias.

warnings.errorMessage: Buckets used with Amazon S3 Transfer Acceleration can't have dots (.) in their names.

name_it_right.explanation: Use only letters, numbers, hyphens, or underscores with no spaces.

User names can be a combination of up to 64 letters, digits, and these characters: plus (+), equal (=), comma (,), period (.), at sign (@), underscore (_), and hyphen (-). Names must be unique within an account. They are not distinguished by case. For example, you cannot create two users named TESTUSER and testuser.
Stack name can include letters (A-Z and a-z), numbers (0-9), and dashes (-).
There can be a maximum of 255 characters. The valid characters are letters (uppercase and lowercase), numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
Up to 100 Unicode characters, not including forward slash (/)
Up to 128 letters (uppercase and lowercase), numbers, hyphens, and underscores are allowed
Up to 128 letters (uppercase and lowercase), numbers, hyphens, and underscores are allowed
Up to 128 letters (uppercase and lowercase), numbers, hyphens, and underscores are allowed
Up to 128 letters (uppercase and lowercase), numbers, hyphens, and underscores are allowed
Must be 1-80 characters. Can use alphanumeric characters, dashes, or underscores.
Use alphanumeric and '+=,.@-_' characters. Maximum 128 characters.
Maximum 256 characters. Can include alphanumeric characters, hyphens (-) and underscores (_). FIFO topic names must end with ".fifo".
A queue name is case-sensitive and can have up to 80 characters. You can use alphanumeric characters, hyphens (-), and underscores ( _ ).
Database name is required, in lowercase characters, and no longer than 255 characters.
If you plan to access the table from Amazon Athena, then the name should be under 256 characters and contain only lowercase letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and underscore (_).
Only letters (A-Z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-), underscores (_), dollar signs ($), periods (.), or hash marks (#) allowed. 255 characters maximum.
Only letters (A-Z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-), underscores (_), dollar signs ($), periods (.), or hash marks (#) allowed. 255 characters maximum.
Name may contain letters (A-Z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-), or underscores (_), and can be up to 255 characters long.
Name may contain letters (A-Z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-), or underscores (_), and can be up to 255 characters long.
Names may only contain letters (A-Z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-), or underscores (_)
Name may contain letters (A-Z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-), or underscores (_), and can be up to 255 characters long.
The project name must contain 1-255 characters. Valid characters are alphanumeric (A-Z, a-z, 0-9), hyphen (-), period (.), and space.
The dataset name must contain 1-255 characters. Valid characters are alphanumeric (A-Z, a-z, 0-9), hyphen (-), period (.), and space.
The recipe name must contain 1-255 characters. Valid characters are alphanumeric (A-Z, a-z, 0-9), hyphen (-), period (.), and space.
The ruleset name must contain 1-255 characters. Valid characters are alphanumeric (A-Z, a-z, 0-9), hyphen (-), period (.), and space.
The job name must contain 1-240 characters. Valid characters are alphanumeric (A-Z, a-z, 0-9), hyphen (-), period (.), and space.
Acceptable characters are uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens, and periods.
Name may contain letters (A-Z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-), or under-scores (_), and be less than 256 characters.
The name must be unique and can have a maximum of 64 characters. You can't change this name after you have created the cluster.
A unique name is required but the name canâ€™t start with a hyphen. Valid characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and - (hyphen)
The name must be unique and can have up to 128 characters. Valid characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and - (hyphen). You canâ€™t change the name after you have created the worker configuration.
The name must start with a lowercase letter and must be between 3 and 28 characters. Valid characters are a-z (lowercase only), 0-9, and - (hyphen).
The identifier must be from 1-63 characters. Valid characters are a-z (lowercase only) and - (hyphen).
The name must be from 3-64 characters. Valid characters are a-z (lowercase only), 0-9 (numbers), and - (hyphen).
Maximum of 256 characters consisting of numbers, lower/upper case letters, .,-,_.
Maximum of 64 characters consisting of numbers, lower/upper case letters, .,-,_.
Maximum of 64 characters consisting of numbers, lower/upper case letters, .,-,_.
Maximum of 48 characters consisting of numbers, lower/upper case letters, .,-,_. You can't change the name of the archive after it is created.
Maximum of 64 characters consisting of numbers, lower/upper case letters, .,-,_.
Maximum of 385 characters consisting of lower case letters, upper case letters, ., -, _, @.
Must be 1-50 characters long. Limited to alphanumeric characters, dashes, and underscores.
Limited to alphanumeric characters, dashes, and underscores. Maximum 120 characters.
The billing group name can have up to 128 characters. Blank spaces and special characters are not valid.
0 out of 256 characters maximum (2 minimum). The name must start with a letter and can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores, periods and forward slashes.

The cluster name should begin with letter or digit and can have any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, hyphens and underscores. Maximum length of 100. This property cannot be changed after the cluster is created.
Master username must start with a letter and contain 1 to 63 characters
The name is required, can have up to 40 characters and must not contain spaces.
The name is required, can have up to 40 characters and must not contain spaces.
The ID is required, can have up to 40 characters, and must begin with a letter. It should not end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and -(hyphen).
The ID is required, can have up to 40 characters, and must begin with a letter. It should not end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and - (hyphen).
The name is required, can have up to 40 characters, and must begin with a letter. It should not end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and -(hyphen)
The name is required, can have up to 40 characters, and must begin with a letter. It should not end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and -(hyphen)
The name is required, can have up to 40 characters, and must begin with a letter. It should not end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and -(hyphen)
The name is required, can have up to 255 characters, and must begin with a letter. It should not end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and -(hyphen)
The name is required, can have up to 255 characters, and must begin with a letter. It should not end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and -(hyphen)

The name must be unique cross all DB clusters owned by your AWS account in the current AWS Region. The DB cluster identifier is case-insensitive, but is stored as all lowercase (as in "mydbcluster"). Constraints: 1 to 60 alphanumeric characters or hyphens. First character must be a letter. Can't contain two consecutive hyphens. Can't end with a hyphen.
You won't be able to modify the name after your subnet group has been created. Must contain from 1 to 255 characters. Alphanumeric characters, spaces, hyphens, underscores, and periods are allowed.

Specify a name that is unique for all ledgers owned by your AWS account in the current Region. The ledger name must contain from 1 to 32 alphanumeric characters or hyphens, with at least one non-numeric character.
Specify a name that is unique among all active streams for a given ledger. The stream name must contain from 1 to 32 alphanumeric characters or hyphens, with at least one non-numeric character.

Must be between 3 and 256 characters long. Must contain letters, digits, dashes, periods or underscores. Specify a name that is unique for all Timestream databases in your AWS account in the current Region. You can not change this name once you create it.

Must be between 3 and 256 characters long. Must contain letters, digits, dashes, periods or underscores. Specify a name that is unique for all Timestream databases in your AWS account in the current Region. You can not change this name once you create it.
Valid characters in dashboard names include "0-9A-Za-z-_".
Limit of 60 characters, alphanumeric, and unique per user.
A project name must be 2 to 255 characters. It can include the letters A-Z and a-z, the numbers 0-9, and the special characters - and _.
100 characters maximum. Other limits apply.
100 character limit
100 character limit
No more than 100 characters
Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _ - (hyphen)
Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _ - (hyphen)

Use only letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, or underscores with no spaces.
Use only letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, or underscores with no spaces.
Use only letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, or underscores with no spaces.
Use only letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, or underscores with no spaces.
Valid characters: a-z, 0-9, and _ (underscore).
The name can be up to 128 characters. Valid characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, colon (:), underscore (_), and hyphen (-).
Name must be alphanumeric, unique and contain fewer than 128 characters. It must start with a letter and contain no spaces.
The dataset group name must have 1 to 63 characters. Valid characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and _
The name can have up to 256 characters. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, space, and % + . / : = @ _ - (hyphen).
Maximum of 1000 alphanumeric characters. Can include hyphens (-), but not spaces.
Maximum 100 characters. Valid characters: Aâ€“Z, aâ€“z, 0â€“9, -, _
The name can have up to 63 character max. Valid characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, - (hyphen) and _.
The dataset group name must have 1-63 characters with no spaces. Valid characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and _ - (hyphen).
Maximum of 63 alphanumeric characters. Can include hyphens (-), but not spaces. Must be unique within your account in an AWS Region.
The repository name must be unique in your account and in the AWS Region and can have up to 63 characters. Valid characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and - (hyphen)
The model package name must be unique in your account and in the AWS Region and can have up to 63 characters. Valid characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and - (hyphen)
Maximum of 63 alphanumeric characters. Can include hyphens (-), but not spaces. Must be unique within your account in an AWS Region.
Maximum of 63 alphanumeric characters. Can include hyphens (-), but not spaces. Must be unique within your account in an AWS Region.
3-128 characters. Only letters, numbers, periods, underscores, and dashes are allowed.
Maximum length: 128 characters. May include numbers, letters, underscores (_) and hyphens (-).

The name must be unique among all of your replication instances in the current AWS region. 
Replication instance name must not start with a numeric value
Alphanumeric characters, dashes, and underscores are allowed.

The namespace name can have up to 1,024 characters, and must start and end with a letter.
Valid characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, . (period), _ (underscore), and - (hyphen)
Use only letters, numbers, hyphens, or underscores with no spaces.
Enter only letters, numbers or hyphens (-) with no spaces.

Must be between 1 and 255 characters. Valid characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9, - (hyphen), and _ (underscore). No spaces.
The name must have 1-128 characters. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, - (hyphen), and _ (underscore).

The name must have 1-128 characters. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, - (hyphen), and _ (underscore).
Maximum 128 characters. Use alphanumeric and '+=,.@-_' characters.
Profile name must contain from 2 to 64 characters. Valid characters are lowercase a-z, uppercase A-Z, 0-9, and _ (underscore).
Backup vault name is case sensitive. Must contain from 2 to 50 alphanumeric or '-_' characters.
Backup plan name is case sensitive. Must contain from 1 to 50 alphanumeric or '-_.' characters.
Name can include letters, numbers, and +-=._:/ symbols, up to 256 characters.
Maximum of 47 alphanumeric characters, plus . - _ . Must begin with a letter or underscore
Maximum of 203 alphanumeric characters, plus _ - : .

Must be unique within a single AWS account and Region, comply with DNS naming restrictions, must begin with a number or lowercase letter, must be between 3 and 50 characters long, can't begin or end with a hyphen (-), can't contain underscores (_), uppercase letters, or periods (.), can't end with the suffix -s3alias. This suffix is reserved for access point alias names.
